title: Did they buff Karma or something?
body: Because holy fuck she did shitloads with only {{item:3114}} and {{item:3303}}

replies.body:
Passive - Gathering Fire
MANTRA COOLDOWN REDUCTION 2/2.5/3 seconds per enemy champion hit (1/1.25/1.5 for basic attacks) ⇒ 2/3/4 seconds per enemy champion hit (1/1.5/2 for basic attacks)

they did buff karma but it was a CDR buff not damage. Her mantra Q has always had a 1 to 1 ratio with AP built so it hits like a truck especially if she runs AP runes
well they also buffed the ap on the {{item:3303}}
they sure did and that helps with her mantra Q!

Nothing out of the ordinary here. Shes always had scary as hell early damage. If you disrespect her shell just spew all of her combo and damage onto you, then that should be pretty much to drive you out of lane all on its own.

Karma has always been crazy-good. She's been a bit forgotten due to the surge in popularity between {{champion:117}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:40}}.

Make no mistake; in the hands of an expert, Karma is absolutely terrifying.

Nothing new, she has really stupid frontloaded damage on her RQ and always had. The trick is not standing still so you get hit by all three parts of the spell.

Incidentally the cooldown is reduced by about 15 seconds when she nails you and a support with it like that.
